page.title: 10THE EILDON HILLS (cont.)
page.content: At the bottom of Eildon Mid Hill there is a rifle range which is used by the Territorial Army in the holidays.There are six permanent targets and there are also facilities for paper targets which are produced locally in Galashiels. Also at the bottom of Eildon Mid Hill there are{Goverment Emergency Water {Tanks}in case of drought. At the top of the Mid Hill there is a sundial and a direction finder.These were put up for the thousands of tourists who walk up the hills every year.On the south-west side of the Mid Hill there is a ring of trees where King Arthur and his Knights are supposed to lie until the country needs their help. There are many sheeptracks,springs and quarries on the hills between Eildon Mid Hill and Eildon Hill North.
